Title: Greyson Blaise (No. 37)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Lukas Reiter, Jon Bokenkamp, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: The team pursues a billionaire high end art thief. Tom seeks to identify the remains in the suitcase.
